name: The Loudest Ballerina
description:
Your father gives you specially hand made ballet shoes made of steel. After he requests you wear them at your next dance recital, you overhear your instructor telling the story of a monstrous creature buried beneath the ballet studio.

Now you must perform, making as little noise as possible with your steel shoes, while still attempting to please your father with your performance...

Made for the 29th Ludum Dare 48 hour competition with the theme "Beneath the Surface".
